author: Techlore
description:
Apple's moving to integrate end-to-end encryption (E2EE) into the RCS open standard messaging marks a major privacy win for both iOS and Android users. In this video, Techlore breaks down what this means for your secure messaging experience, comparing RCS to SMS and exploring the technical details behind this industry-shifting standard. We also delve into potential drawbacks, like metadata collection, and discuss how this impacts the broader landscape of secure communication.

Check out Notesnook for a cross-platform E2EE notes provider: https://notesnook.com

title: Privacy WIN! Apple & Android Unite for Secure Messaging
